messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I am gregory wright second in captain

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Service Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Medbay Treatment Center.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that all of the station's pets has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a horde of rodents have swarmed into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a pack of squeaking things have migrated into the maintenance areas.
